Description: A small vial filled with a familliar red translucent liquid.
A small vial filled with a blue effervescent liquid.
A dagger with a strange shimmer to the blade.
Abilities: Contains 3 unreplenishable charges of the Silent Image spell (1st level)

Description: The potion is separated into brown, silver, and gray layers resembling bands of stone. Shaking the bottle fails to mix the colors.
Abilities: When you drink this potion, you gain a climbing speed equal to your walking speed for 1 hour. During this time, you have advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks you make to climb.

Description: A plain arrow with a thin gold coil along its shaft.
Abilities: When you fire this arrow add one to your roll to hit and one to your damage.
Mastery: while attuned to this stone your proficiency bonus increases by one.
